function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'strrchr' to reach function 'fseek'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < argc' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i < argc' always executed?

Is the loop with condition '*p' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < argc' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '*p' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'string (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'zero (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Is variable 'c' live at the end of function 'hexdump'?
Does variable 'n' remain in use at the end of function 'hexdump'?
